org.itemscript.core.gwt
Class GwtSystem

java.lang.Object
  org.itemscript.core.gwt.GwtSystem
All Implemented Interfaces:
com.google.gwt.core.client.EntryPoint
public final class GwtSystem
extends java.lang.Object
implements com.google.gwt.core.client.EntryPoint

An EntryPoint class for GWT that creates a static JsonSystem instance.

Author:
Jacob Davies
jacob@itemscript.org

public static com.google.gwt.core.client.JavaScriptObject convertAndWrapValue(JsonValue value)
Create a JavaScriptObject wrapper around a converted JsonValue, where the JS equivalent of the JsonValue will be stored in the wrapper object under the key "value".

Returns:
